/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -std=c++0x   -shared -Wl,-soname,libBaseController.so -o libBaseController.so CMakeFiles/BaseController.dir/BaseController.cpp.o  -L/usr/local/lib/argos3 -largos3core_simulator -largos3plugin_simulator_footbot -largos3plugin_simulator_genericrobot -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib/argos3
